message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. This is a limited-time offer, so don't hesitate to accept it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the deal, but I'm looking to pay closer to $85.  Let me know what you think.
I understand your position, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $90? That's still a great deal for you, and it's more than fair considering the value of the product.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $90 is still a bit high for me.  I'm happy to pay $88.  This is my final offer, so let me know if we can make a deal.
Bob, thank you for your persistence. Considering the value of the product and your interest, how about we finalize the deal at $89? This is my best offer, and I believe it's a fair compromise.
